actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE sys_dict SET
		name = '{{update_form.fieldState.name.isVisible ? update_form.formData.name : update_form.sourceData.name}}',
		description = '{{update_form.fieldState.description.isVisible ? update_form.formData.description : update_form.sourceData.description}}',
    create_by = '{{update_form.fieldState.create_by.isVisible ? update_form.formData.create_by : update_form.sourceData.create_by}}',
		update_by = '{{update_form.fieldState.update_by.isVisible ? update_form.formData.update_by : update_form.sourceData.update_by}}',
		create_time = '{{update_form.fieldState.create_time.isVisible ? update_form.formData.create_time : update_form.sourceData.create_time}}',
		update_time = '{{update_form.fieldState.update_time.isVisible ? update_form.formData.update_time : update_form.sourceData.update_time}}'
WHERE dict_id = {{data_table.selectedRow.dict_id}};
